definition: roll over on side/turn half over
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
to toss about in bed/from person to person/indirectly/to wander
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)

sentences.english: Cold rolling of bearing rings is a advanced process substituted for turning.
sentences.chinese: 軸承套圈的冷輾擴是一種以輾代車的先進工藝。

sentences.english: The key process of the one-heat rotary forging is black making of the automobile′s half shaft on the rotary forging machine.
sentences.chinese: 在擺輾機上預鍛製坯是一火擺動輾壓成形的關鍵。

definition: to fall/meteor/to perish/see also 殞|殒[yun3]
to relegate a high official to a minor post in an outlying region (punishment in imperial China)/to banish or exile/(of immortals) to banish from Heaven/to censure/to blame
have as remainder/trad. variant of 剩[sheng4]
to reject/to expel/to discard/to exclude/to renounce
to expel/to oust/(dialect) to chase after/to try to catch up with
